artist: Artist: Antoni Tàpies; Publisher: Maeght Éditeur, Paris
description: cream paper folded in half; front: a face from the eyes up when viewed from the R edge, orange line above eyebrows, with a playing card above; interior: one face up playing card on L side and loose blue marks on R; back: originally black, but now has an off-set stain of an "X" with a playing card at center; Lender's archive #168
image_copyright: © Antoni T%C3%A0pies %2F Artists Rights Society %28ARS%29%2C New York
portfolio: From Cartes per a la Teresa
provenance: William P. Kosmas, London, England (d. 2017); Estate of William P. Kosmas, Minneapolis
signed: Signed in pencil on portfolio\'s colophon page: Tàpies
title: Plate from Cartes per a la Teresa (Letters to Teresa)
